participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Shy and introverted, she often feels overwhelmed in social situations but finds joy in gaming.
participant_1.background: i do not have many friends. i hate school. i am a 12 year old girl. i love to play pobox.

participant_2.background: i live in colorado. i am a mechanical engineer. my favorite activity is rock climbing. i've a black lab named trooper. i like to go hiking in the spring.
